THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The explicit use of 'WRONG' in large text and the red X under the iconic WD-40 can directly support the title's negative directive ('Stop using WD-40'). The check mark on an alternative bottle reinforces the message that there is a better option.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Any contrasts or mismatches between thum: No major mismatches. The thumbnail is clear and reinforces the title's message. Both highlight WD-40 as the incorrect choice.
